Russia launches missile attacks across the country, say Ukrainian officialsRussia launched a large-scale missile attack across Ukraine at the start of peak morning hours on Monday, hitting residential and industrial facilities and injuring several people, Ukraine's officials said. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:43:24 GMT SE2L5WZKFZLD3FNEGMWBCZBXOY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-missile-attacks-across-country-say-ukrainian-officials-2024-01-08/Dan Peleschuk, Pavel Polityuk世界欧洲
South Korea police arrest another man linked to attack on opposition leader -YonhapSouth Korean police on Monday arrested a man linked to an attack last week on opposition Democratic Party leader Lee Jae-myung, the Yonhap news agency reported. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:29:04 GMT QL3YGOZLNVJEFANV37KD2SCKOA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-police-arrest-another-man-linked-attack-opposition-leader-yonhap-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Explainer: What is the genocide case against Israel at top UN court?The International Court of Justice will hold hearings this week on a case brought by South Africa accusing Israel of genocide in the Gaza war and seeking an emergency suspension of its military campaign. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:05:10 GMT D33QTG2OQNLGBB3ZKWDAYIXOAI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/what-is-genocide-case-against-israel-top-un-court-2024-01-08/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界中东
Trump says he will attend federal appeals court arguments on presidential immunityDonald Trump said he will be attending an appeals court hearing regarding the scope of his presidential immunity in Washington D.C. on Tuesday, in comments in a Truth Social post on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 05:52:08 GMT O2ETGZNJ3VPJ3OO3LWFFENOBRQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-says-will-attend-federal-appeals-court-arguments-presidential-immunity-2024-01-08/Reuters世界美国
India court quashes remission in sentence of men in Muslim woman's gang-rape -mediaIndia's top court on Monday quashed the remission in sentence given to 11 Hindu men who had been jailed for life for gang-raping a pregnant Muslim woman and murdering her relatives during Hindu-Muslim riots in Gujarat state in 2002, local media reported. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 05:38:08 GMT YUA2OT4ZFJLLPLRXOLWXHV2YJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-court-quashes-remission-given-11-hindu-men-muslim-womans-gang-rape-case-2024-01-08/Reuters世界印度
US investigators recover key part from Alaska Airlines 737 MAX jetThe U.S. National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said late on Sunday the "key missing component" from the Boeing 737 MAX 9 jet involved in an Alaska Airlines emergency landing had been recovered from the backyard of a suburban home. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 05:21:55 GMT NXZDC762KVOBHOGBBTVRPJ4T4E https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/no-data-captured-alaska-airlines-737-cockpit-voice-recorder-ntsb-chair-2024-01-08/David Shepardson, Valerie Insinna, Tim Hepher商业航空航天与国防
Ecuador's 'most-wanted' criminal disappears from prisonEcuador's "most-wanted prisoner", the leader of the Los Choneros criminal group, disappeared from the jail where he was being held, authorities said on Sunday and launched an operation to locate him. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:51:43 GMT AYRBFYTBNRURIRAALBFYE3ORPQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuadors-most-wanted-criminal-disappears-prison-2024-01-08/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
Indonesia presidential frontrunner under fire as rivals attack defence plansIndonesian presidential frontrunner Prabowo Subianto suffered a barrage of attacks in a heated election debate on Sunday, with his two opponents taking aim at his military procurement strategy as defence minister, calling him reckless and wasteful. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:21:05 GMT E2WB6X4AONK6BJIPXQDDQB3OBY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-presidential-frontrunner-under-fire-rivals-attack-defence-plans-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ignoring Taiwan's complaints, more Chinese balloons spotted over straitTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected three more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:44:36 GMT MZVGLYUCP5IUDGULHDJMI7QKMA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ignoring-taiwans-complaints-more-chinese-balloons-spotted-over-strait-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Gambian ex-minister faces rape, torture charges in long-awaited Swiss trialSwitzerland will try a former Gambian minister under ousted dictator Yahya Jammeh for crimes against humanity on Monday in a milestone case where a serial rape victim will testify after a multi-decade wait for justice. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:11:54 GMT NTY36UBJZNJWTMMMBWEEJZG5ZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/gambian-ex-minister-faces-rape-torture-charges-long-awaited-swiss-Trial-2024-01-08/Emma Farge世界非洲
Mass killer Breivik sues Norway in bid to end prison isolationAnders Behring Breivik, the far-right fanatic who killed 77 people in a bombing and shooting rampage in Norway in 2011, will ask a court on Monday to end his isolation in prison, saying it violates his human rights. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:06:10 GMT BCLERSQOQ5KMHEG6ECEVOXJMPE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/mass-killer-breivik-sues-norway-bid-end-prison-isolation-2024-01-08/Gwladys Fouche世界欧洲
